long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A third party Open AI client that provides an interface for users to create and store prompt templates. Users can utilize these prompts with the click of a button across the web by highlighting text, or inputting via the chrome extension pop up. All powered using the users own API key, so you are guaranteed the cheapest token rate offered by Open AI. 

Some useful cases: 
1. Summarize an article or portions of text 
2. Not sure how to word something? Easily convert it into a professional setting.
3. Make a snippet of text very concise 
4. Fluff up some text to increase your word count.

These are only a few of many use cases to increase your efficiency on the web.
